price: iako će jedni druge vidjeti. Prestupnik će htjeti da se od patnje taj dan iskupi sinovima svojim,
arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: yubaṣṣarūnahum yawaddu al-muj'rimu law yaftadī min ʿadhābi yawmi-idhin bibanīhi
translations: They will be made to see each other
